mapper.insert: insert into mr_job_tasks_schedule( consume_lane, assign_node, data_table, register_time, heart_beat_date, dispose_schedule, alarm_number, insert_number, update_number, del_number, create_user_id, update_user_id, create_time, update_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{consumeLane}, #{assignNode}, #{dataTable}, #{registerTime}, #{heartBeatDate}, #{disposeSchedule}, #{alarmNumber}, #{insertNumber}, #{updateNumber}, #{delNumber}, #{createUserId}, #{updateUserId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update mr_job_tasks_schedule set consume_lane = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.consumeLane}, assign_node = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.assignNode}, data_table = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.dataTable}, register_time = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.registerTime}, heart_beat_date = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.heartBeatDate}, dispose_schedule = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.disposeSchedule}, alarm_number = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.alarmNumber}, insert_number = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.insertNumber}, update_number = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.updateNumber}, del_number = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.delNumber}, create_user_id = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.createUserId}, update_user_id = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.updateUserId}, create_time = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.createTime}, update_time = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.updateTime}, state = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.state}, iscancel = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.iscancel}, remark = #{mrJobTasksSchedule.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, consume_lane AS consumeLane, assign_node AS assignNode, data_table AS dataTable, register_time AS registerTime, heart_beat_date AS heartBeatDate, dispose_schedule AS disposeSchedule, alarm_number AS alarmNumber, insert_number AS insertNumber, update_number AS updateNumber, del_number AS delNumber, create_user_id AS createUserId, update_user_id AS updateUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, state, iscancel, remark from mr_job_tasks_schedule where id = #{id}

select id, consume_lane AS consumeLane, assign_node AS assignNode, data_table AS dataTable, register_time AS registerTime, heart_beat_date AS heartBeatDate, dispose_schedule AS disposeSchedule, alarm_number AS alarmNumber, insert_number AS insertNumber, update_number AS updateNumber, del_number AS delNumber, create_user_id AS createUserId, update_user_id AS updateUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, state, iscancel, remark from mr_job_tasks_schedule where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
